Win Over Competition By Deploying Custom CRM PackagesHi Stanley In current economic conditions you need to pay the customer to win business Now more than ever there is a great need for companies increase their customer service levels by utilizing the power of customized CRM applications Moreover if youre using the same CRM package that your competition is you areat least in theoryusing the same business practices Izhuta is an eBusiness services and applications outsourcing company that delivers innovativeflexible technologybased solutions for Global companies through its more than employees worldwide With vast expertise in developing Web based applications and CRM Applications we can help EOTT Energy Partners LP to leverage business with tailored CRM Solutions Please visit for more information Below is an article on InterWorld which stresses the need for custom CRM applications newsphpinccrmbhtml Stanley Thank you for your time and contact me at ext if you are interested in deploying a custom CRM solution tailored for your needs Regards Hema Malini zhutacom Phone ext atteml

Do we have a SynergyHi Steven I know that you are very busy but our software solutions may be just the competitive advantage that you are seeking for your business today By using our CostEffective IT solutions to fulfil your technology needs in Q of before your competition does you might realize major benefits Would you like to get together for an hour where I can learn more about what you want to do and I can guide you through some solutions to help you clearly differentiate yourself from your competition We can offer Enron Corp Our Certified Microsoft and SunJava professionals are available at hr to work on your projectsWe have nearly employees and state of the art development facilities Our Technology and Development centers in India are considered the crown jewel of Izhuta and is a key distinguisher for you We have have expertise in providing solutions for various kinds of industries and with new technologies Please visit for more information Steven please let me know if we have any synergies I look forward to your comments and our next meeting Best regards Hema Malini zhutacom Phone ext

ISO Certified Software Development at Cost Effective PricesThis may be the fastest any industry of our size has ever decelerated which has required us to make difficult business decisions at an unprecedented speed said John Chamber Ciscos chief executive THE WALL STREET JOURNAL Hi Kenneth I know that you are busy and I appreciate your time If you think that I need to speak with another person at Enron Corp please let me know how I should contact them Todays market is tough and companies are constantly looking for ways to improve their bottom line As a result many companies are taking advantage of a global IT outsourcing model Outsourcing allows companies to free up internal resources cut development and IT costs by over and keep up with leading technologies Speed flexibility and roundtheclock productivity are the hallmarks of Izhuta Software Development Outsourcing Services Our fast and flexible onoff site offshore x delivery model lends itself to a full spectrum of outsourcing services from applications maintenance development and modernization to full technology outsourcing including data center operations Please visit homeSavepercentasp for more information on our cost effective servives We can offer Enron Corp Our Certified Microsoft and SunJava professionals are available at hr to work on your projects We are located closer to you Please let me know when you can spare minutes of your valueable time to have a chance to meet with you and help you in scoping of a project which can increase your productivity multifold Regards Hema Malini zhutacom Phone ext

Software Development for by Microsoft and Sun certified DevelopersHi Jeff We can offer you a dedicated team of Microsoft and SunCertified junior to senior level software developers for per hourper developer In this competitive market companies are constantly looking for ways to become more efficient while maximizing cost savings How are you currently running your internal technology projects Have you thought about utilizing a company to manage and maintain these projects for you Outsourcing allows companies to free up internal resources cut development and IT costs by to and keep up with leading technologies Izhuta will provide Enron Corp with a total solution Our services include Custom Application Development Full Application Development and Maintenance Services Full application Reengineering Services Application Migration and Porting Services Network and Systems Management Fully Staffed Development Centers as Joint Ventures ownership to Offsite Development Staff Please visit homeSavepercentasp homeoutsourcingfaqshtml for more information on our services Please let me know when you can set a side minutes of your time to discuss possible synergies between our two companies Regards Hema Izhuta West Tidwell Suite Houston TX Phone ext ext Fax

Software Development OutsourcingThe New Mantra to Reduce IT spendingDear Jeff Speed flexibility and roundtheclock productivity are the hallmarks of Izhuta Software Development Outsourcing Services Our fast and flexible onoff site offshore x delivery model lends itself to a full spectrum of outsourcing services from applications maintenance development and modernization to full technology outsourcing including data center operations We can offer Enron Corp Our Certified Microsoft and SunJava professionals are available at hr to work on your projectsWe have nearly employees and state of the art development facilities Our Technology and Development centers in India are considered the crown jewel of Izhuta and is a key distinguisher for you OutSourcingFAQsasp Over the years our Global Technology Centers GTCs in India have achieved an impressive record of project accomplishments for our US European and Asian customers Our Innovation Centers ICs and GTCs offer the following capabilities for our customers a Custom Application Development b Application Development and Maintenance Outsourcing c Application Reengineering Services d Data Migration and Porting Services e x Help Desk Call Center Support Services Although all of our services can be accomplished in one of our US Innovation Centers our customers gain significant added value by utilizing the power of our offshore Global Technology Center capabilities Please visit homeSavePercentasp This x development and delivery model enables Izhuta to scale project staffing rapidly to meet client needs to engage in concurrent development and to employ a virtual hour work day on client projects Jeff Please let us know if we can set a quick meeting to discuss these details Look forward to hearing from you soon Regards Hema Malini zhutacom Phone ext

Enhance Your Customer RelationsHi Jeff I realize that you are busy however I believe this is worth a few moments of your time For any business to succeed there is always a need to treat each customer as the only customer eCRM allows businesses to build personalized relationships with their customers by offering them customized products and services in a quick and timely manner Businesses need to integrate all modes of communication web email chat video voice to serve and support their customers in order to maximize customer satisfaction Izhuta can provide Enron Corp with an eCRM solution that will be of internal costs and beat time to market requirements Our services include Custom Application Development Full Application Development and Maintenance Services Full application Reengineering Services Application Migration and Porting Services Network and Systems Management x Application Support Services Technical Expertise C Java XML Wireless embedded and many more Fully Staffed Development Centers as Joint Ventures ownership to Offsite Development Staff I have attached a few links that give a more in depth illustration of our services homeizhutasolutionshtml HomeSavepercentasp We can also provide enroncom with x LiveHelp Desk services to maximize customer support and hence maximize the revenues Please visit for more information our LiveHelp Desk services Please let me know when you can set aside minutes of your time to discuss possible synergies between our two companies Regards Hema Malini zhutacom Phone ext

Improve Collaboration across your enterprise through a Secure IntranetHi I know that you are busy and I appreciate your time If you think that I need to speak with another person within Enron Corp please let me know how I should contact them In this competitive market most companies need to be able to access mission critical information from their desktops without having to call or dialup into the corporate intranets Islands of data are usually created when the majority of sales and administrative staff are working in various locationsThus there is a need for operational framework integrating human resourcesmarketing legal services and various other divisions We at Izhuta can help you integrate your corporate intranet infrastructure at half the costand twice the speed Izhuta Solutions will provide Enron Corp with a total solution Our services include Custom Application Development Full Application Development and Maintenance Services Full application Reengineering Services Application Migration and Porting Services Network and Systems Management x Application Support Services Technical Expertise C Java XML Wireless embedded and many more Fully Staffed Development Centers as Joint Ventures ownership to Offsite Development Staff The following is a case study of a corporate intranet infrastructure which we developed techyugaNETcasestudyhtm To experience our efficiency and deliverability please visit FreeProposalasp to test drive our services for FREE Please let me know of a convenient time to contact you and schedule a more indepth conversation about our intranet solutions Regards Hema Malini zhutacom Phone ext

Improve your margins by enhancing your IT InfrastructureHi In an industry driven by forces such as economic change consolidation globalization and integration of industrywide supply chains new forms of doing business become a necessity Manufacturers are constantly looking to optimize customer supplier and distributor relationships to meet the rising expectations of their customers Izhuta combines a thorough understanding of business knowledge in the areas of manufacturing operations and processes and supply chain imperatives with its high delivery process maturity and capabilities to develop and deploy business solutions Izhuta utilizes the potential of legacy current and emerging technologies to deliver service offerings in the areas of manufacturing operations logistics and retail distribution These include IT Assessment and Planning Complete Ebusiness Solutions Package and System Implementations Engineering Services Customer Management Programs Program Management Office Warehouse and Inventory Management Systems Custom Application Development System Implementation and Integration Application Integration Sustenance and Rearchitecting Please let me know of a convenient time to discuss as to how our solutions can help your company to improve your margins by enhancing internal productivity and enable better service levels by streamlining your supply efficiency Regards Hema Malini zhutacom Phone ext
